org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql
Class AeConnectionInvocationHandlerFactory.AeVerifyCommitOrRollbackInvocationHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeConnectionInvocationHandlerFactory.AeRestoreAutoCommitHandler
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeConnectionInvocationHandlerFactory.AeVerifyCommitOrRollbackInvocationHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler
Enclosing class:
AeConnectionInvocationHandlerFactory
private class AeConnectionInvocationHandlerFactory.AeVerifyCommitOrRollbackInvocationHandler
extends AeConnectionInvocationHandlerFactory.AeRestoreAutoCommitHandler

Implements a method invocation handler that passes all method calls to an underlying JDBC connection but verifies that either Connection.commit() or Connection.rollback() is called before Connection.close().

Field Summary
private  boolean mIsOkayToClose
          Flag that records whether it is okay to close the connection without an error message.

AeConnectionInvocationHandlerFactory.AeVerifyCommitOrRollbackInvocationHandler(java.sql.Connection aConnection)
          Constructs the method invocation handler for the specified JDBC connection.
